infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show nearby parking spots and share your location when leaving a spot.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to show nearby parking spots and share your location when leaving a spot.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow SpotMe to use your location to show nearby parking spots and share your location when leaving a spot.
